mapper.select: SELECT SCDL_ID, SCDL_TITL, SCDL_TYP_CD FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.TB_SCDL_DTL WHERE SUBSTR(SCDL_STT_DTTM, 1, 8) = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND SCDL_TYP_CD = 'O' ORDER BY SCDL_STT_DTTM DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT SM.BEGINHR AS BEGIN_TIME, SM.ENDHR AS END_TIME FROM DB_HOMEPAGE.SIGNCNSLTMGT AS SM WHERE SM.OFDAY = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d') AND SM.USE_YN = '01' ORDER BY SM.SIGNMGT_NUM DESC LIMIT 1
